content: My name is Peter Schmidt. I am the landlord of the apartment in Duisburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Haoyu Wang from China. He is interested in renting the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during our conversation.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide an exact number. The conversation ended with Haoyu Wang offering 750 Euro per month, which was not quite acceptable to me as the landlord.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1-10, how satisfied are you with the outcome? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As a landlord, I am not satisfied with the outcome of the negotiation. I would rate my satisfaction level as a 3 out of 10.
name: Peter Schmidt
